Connection abstract class, implemented with both RMI and Socket.
ContentType
This enum is required to specify what content is provided along with the client request message.

Following interface is in charge of exposing getter methods which provide context information for request handling

This class is in charge of attaching the required pregame request parameters to create a new game

EmptySelectionBuffer

This class is in charge of throwing an error message whenever it is attempted to add a new player to an already full game

EndGame controller class
GamesList
This class is in charge of returning to a client the list of all currently available games
GameState
Class that describes the state of a specific game
GridManager
Class in charge of creating a tile grid (either for boards or libraries) of specified size
GUIUtils
Class in charge of handling basic GUI operations

InGame controller class

PrivateCard
A Private Objective card, which containes a map with coordinates for each tile type and a description
RandomGenerator
Class containing method that generates numbers randomly
ReconnectionHandler
This class is in charge of handling all reconnections of the client after disconnections occur.
ReconnectionTimer
 
RejoinGame
This class is in charge of attaching the required pregame request parameters to re-join an existing game after client disconnection
Reorder
This class is in charge of forwarding a selectionBuffer reorder request to the server.
RequestPacket
This class represents a packet sent from client to server (when using socket).
ResponsePacket
This class is in charge of returning a response status to a client who performed one of the following pre-game requests: 1.
ResponseStatus
Following enum contains the possible server response statuses to pregame requests
SelectionBuffer
SelectionBuffer class to be rendered in the UI
SelectionBufferFullException
This exception class is used to report whenever a user tries to insert tiles in an already full column
Server
 
SGSConsumer
 
SharedGameState
This class holds a representation of the current state of the game relative to a particular player.
SocketConnection
Class that represents the connection via TCP sockets, see Connection
SockServer
This class will act as a dispatcher for incoming connections on the socket server.
TCPIngameChannelDownlink
Class in charge of handling all in-game transmissions from server to client.
TCPIngameChannelUplink
Class in charge of handling all in-game transmissions coming from client.
TCPPregameChannel
This class runs a separate thread for request-response handling from client to server during pregame stage.
ThumbnailWrapper
Class representing an FXML ThumbnailWrapper object.
TilePick
This class is in charge of forwarding a tile pick from the game board
TileState
Enum with the state of each cell on the board, where: - NOT_PICKABLE: cell cannot be picked - PICKABLE: cell can be picked immediately - PICKABLE_NEXT: cell could be picked on subsequent picks
TileType
